entry.title: Monday: Light snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning this morning. Snow mixed with ice pellets this morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Monday 27 February 2023
